description: A better HTML5 parser for PHP.
A PHP framework for web artisans

Applies a patch from a local or remote file to any package that is part of a given composer project. Patches can be defined both on project and on package level. Optional support for patch versioning, sequencing, custom patch applier configuration (global, per patch) and patch command for testing/troubleshooting added patches.
A pure PHP library for reading and writing spreadsheet files
Dependency Manager for PHP
Guzzle, an extensible PHP HTTP client
Comprehensive mailing tools for PHP
Faker is a PHP library that generates fake data for you
A simple PHP API extension for DateTime.
The VarDumper component provides mechanisms for walking through any arbitrary PHP variable. Built on top, it provides a better dump() function that you can use instead of var_dump().
The PHP Unit Testing framework.
Abstraction for local and remote filesystems
A tool to automatically fix PHP coding standards issues
Doctrine Inflector is a small library that can perform string manipulations with regard to uppercase/lowercase and singular/plural forms of words.
The Finder component finds files and directories via an intuitive fluent interface.
The CssSelector component converts CSS selectors to XPath expressions.
A PHP parser written in PHP

Mockery is a simple yet flexible PHP mock object framework for use in unit testing with PHPUnit, PHPSpec or any other testing framework. Its core goal is to offer a test double framework with a succinct API capable of clearly defining all possible object operations and interactions using a human readable Domain Specific Language (DSL).
Associate users with roles and permissions
The Console component eases the creation of beautiful and testable command line interfaces.
PHP 5.x support for random_bytes() and random_int()
Base library for a lexer that can be used in Top-Down, Recursive Descent Parsers.
The HttpFoundation component defines an object-oriented layer for the HTTP specification.
